issues.title: Mission charter and KPI tree
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Mission statement finalized.
- KPI hierarchy defined (quality, cost, energy, reproducibility).
- Moonshot KPI separated from release gates.

Risks:
- KPI ambiguity causes execution drift.

Test Plan:
- Review checklist sign-off from architecture and research owners.

issues.title: Issue taxonomy and templates
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Issue naming convention enforced.
- Phase and jira IDs required in title/body.
- Bug intake template configured.

Risks:
- Inconsistent issue metadata increases technical debt.

Test Plan:
- Validate template output on sample 10 issues.

issues.title: Reproducibility and evaluation policy
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Reproducibility protocol documented in code config.
- Scorecard fields frozen.
- Falsification minimum standard defined.

Risks:
- Non-repeatable experiments reduce trust.

Test Plan:
- Re-run fixed seed scenarios and compare variance limits.

issues.title: Market taxonomy
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Segments include infrastructure, orchestration, vertical copilots, autonomous ops, science agents, safety/eval.
- Demand signals assigned and reviewed.

Risks:
- Missing segment coverage.

Test Plan:
- Taxonomy completeness check against source list.

issues.title: Competitive capability-cost map
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Competitors mapped to segment and cost-accessibility axis.
- Strength and gap fields completed.

Risks:
- Bias toward single vendor narrative.

Test Plan:
- Cross-check entries against primary references.

issues.title: Missing-piece detection
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- At least 10 missing pieces identified.
- Each missing piece linked to evidence and first experiment.

Risks:
- Opportunity inflation without feasibility checks.

Test Plan:
- Feasibility scoring calibration pass.

issues.title: Opportunity ranking matrix
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Weighted scoring defined by impact/feasibility/defensibility/accessibility.
- Ranked portfolio exported as machine-readable artifact.

Risks:
- Weighting misalignment with mission.

Test Plan:
- Sensitivity analysis across scoring weights.

issues.title: Model-agnostic adapter core with Ollama baseline
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Stable model adapter interface implemented.
- Ollama adapter and local fallback adapter operational.

Risks:
- Model-specific drift in behavior.

Test Plan:
- Contract tests across adapters.

issues.title: Multi-agent orchestration kernel
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Parallel agent rounds with shared budget scheduler.
- Consensus and contradiction surfacing implemented.

Risks:
- Coordination overhead exceeds gains.

Test Plan:
- Multi-agent vs baseline comparison on fixed suite.

issues.title: Parallel communication with hint exchange
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Hint packets exchanged between rounds.
- Critic loop influences final output selection.

Risks:
- Echo chamber effects.

Test Plan:
- Ablation with hints disabled vs enabled.

issues.title: Cost governor and budget policy
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Token/latency/energy/usd limits enforced at runtime.
- Remaining budget introspection exposed.

Risks:
- Overly strict limits reduce answer quality.

Test Plan:
- Boundary tests for each budget dimension.

issues.title: Local-first memory and provenance
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- SQLite-backed records for messages/evidence/results.
- Append-only trace log in jsonl format.

Risks:
- Missing provenance fields in critical flows.

Test Plan:
- Persistence and schema tests.

issues.title: Adaptive test-time compute controller
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Depth/branch/early-exit policy implemented.
- Policy reacts to uncertainty and marginal gain.

Risks:
- Under-compute on hard tasks.

Test Plan:
- Decision table tests under edge conditions.

issues.title: Tool-augmented reasoning path
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- MCP-style tool registry available.
- Tool safety checks and schema validation active.

Risks:
- Prompt injection through tools.

Test Plan:
- Malicious payload block-rate tests.

issues.title: Reflection and falsification-first critic loop
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Draft outputs pass critique + falsification checks before release.
- Revision notes attached to final artifacts.

Risks:
- Loop can increase latency.

Test Plan:
- Compare pass-rate with and without reflection loop.

issues.title: Domain micro-specialists and routing
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Role-based specialists configured.
- Routing policy selects specialists per task domain.

Risks:
- Specialist overlap causes redundant compute.

Test Plan:
- Routing ablation by domain tags.

issues.title: Trace distillation pipeline
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Execution traces prepared for compact policy distillation.
- Distilled policy quality tracked against baseline.

Risks:
- Distillation loses critical edge-case behaviors.

Test Plan:
- Held-out case regression checks.

issues.title: Quantum hard benchmark suite
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- QEC + device physics tasks defined with pass thresholds.
- Evaluation scripts produce machine-readable outputs.

Risks:
- Benchmark leakage or overfitting.

Test Plan:
- Blind holdout cases and versioned suite.

issues.title: Counterfactual physics exploration sandbox
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Hypothesis generation supports nonstandard but testable rules.
- Ranking and gate checks integrated.

Risks:
- Non-falsifiable hypotheses flood output.

Test Plan:
- Rule validity gate benchmark.

issues.title: Strict falsification gates
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Physical consistency checks enforced pre-simulation.
- Violations logged with reasons.

Risks:
- Overly rigid checks block valid novelty.

Test Plan:
- False-positive/false-negative validation set.

issues.title: End-to-end researcher guidance mode
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- User question -> executable experiment DAG flow operational.
- Outputs include assumptions, steps, and stop criteria.

Risks:
- Guidance too abstract for execution.

Test Plan:
- Usability validation with novice and expert tasks.

issues.title: Frontier baseline comparison on hard-suite
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Comparative evaluation report generated.
- Cost and quality deltas included.

Risks:
- Baseline mismatch invalidates conclusions.

Test Plan:
- Standardized prompt/eval protocol review.

issues.title: Moonshot benchmark spread tracking
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- General benchmark spread tracked as non-release KPI.
- No gating dependency on moonshot KPI.

Risks:
- KPI confusion with release readiness.

Test Plan:
- Dashboard consistency checks.

issues.title: Reproducible scorecards and failure analysis
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Scorecards include quality, cost, energy, reproducibility, novelty.
- Failure taxonomy exported.

Risks:
- Missing failure metadata.

Test Plan:
- Failure replay drill.

issues.title: Scale path decision framework
issues.body:
Acceptance Criteria:
- Local-only vs hybrid escalation decision criteria finalized.
- Policy includes governance and privacy requirements.

Risks:
- Unclear migration path.

Test Plan:
- Scenario analysis across 3 deployment profiles.
